title: Fragment, 4th century
medium:
Medium: wool embroidery on linen ground
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Bust of a female figure with dark hair and large dark eyes, a laurel wreath on the head, a halo, and wings, with a flower basket held under her chin. A single lily fills the corner above each wing. In dark blue, dark brown, greens, golden yellow, pink, and beige wool chain stitches on undyed linen plain weave, skillfully seamed. Eye whites embroidered in linen.  A few details in varied surface stitches.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 4th century.
4th century. Medium: wool embroidery on linen ground
Technique: embroidered on plain weave. Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1953-70-1.
